summary: Grolrak, a Mythical creature, or Orc as the Orsimers says. He was a "Mythical" Due to his odd skin color. He was a Red Orc, Red of skin, Believed that it was the Wrath,Anger of Malacath wrapped on him.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Lore:
Grolrak,[/u]a Mythical Creature, Or a Mythical Orc as the Orsimers says, He was among all of Orcs, Due to his appearance, instead of being green, he was a Red One, a "Red Orc" as the other says. His Red skin was believed as the Wrath and Anger of Malacath that covers him.
His creation was unknowned, Thus, his Creator. Other  says Malacath created him to guide the other orcs. Other says he was created by one of the Nines to destroy the orcs. Others says he was a protector of the orcs. No one knows how he was created, or who created him.

[b][i]Features:
[/i][/b]- A Tank Follower
- A Orc that goes on a "Killing Machine" State when angry. (Lmao)
- A Orc that can kill you when you are bored and trying to commit a suicide. (Lol)
- A Follower that levels with you.

[i]Stats:
- [/i]250 Health Base
- 200 Health Base
[b][i]------
[/i][/b]- Barbarian
- Sweep
- Deep Wounds
- Limb Splitter
- Juggernaut
- Conditioning
- Reflect Blows

[b][i]Location:
 [b][url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Narzulbur]Narzulbur[/url] - An Orc stronghold located in Eastmarch hold (Thanks to USP!)[/b][/i][/b]

[b][i][u]Armor & Weapon:
[/u][/i][/b]- Orcish Armor (No Helmet)
- Executioner's Axe (Giant Axe! Well not really.)  (-.,,.-)

[i]Installation:
-[/i] Drag and Drop at Skyrim Folder. 


[b][i]Note:
[/i][/b]The "Lore" or My "Lore" was only invented, so any mistake was not intended. Peace to all Lore Fans! 

[i]- SkyrimFreeLancer[/i]
author: SkyrimFreeLancer
